Posts.Content: A sign or symptom is flaky skin on the nipples. Do anyone with breast cancer experience this? I have it, but it is very, very minor and I never paid much attention to it. Today, I found a lump, about pea sized and it is painful. It feels more solid and not cyst-like. (I get cysts and I am familiar with those.) I was wondering besides the actual lump itself, did anyone experience other physical symptoms? Changes in periods?
Posts.Title: Did you experience flaky skin on the nipple, other physical symptoms?

Posts.Content: There is always a list that varies with each source that includes a list of signs and symptoms. What were your signs or symptoms that you noticed before you found out you had breast cancer? Did anyone have a deep itching/tenderness of the tissue in a certain area?
Posts.Title: What Were Your Symptoms?

Posts.Content: Didn't anyone here have symptoms prior to finding out they had breast cancer? Did you experience itching, pitting, or other physical symptoms?
Posts.Title: What Were Your Symptoms?
